thread.title: These are the dirtiest things in your hotel room
thread.title_full: These are the dirtiest things in your hotel room - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: These are the dirtiest things in your hotel room
text: When you check into a hotel room there are certain things inside that are usually dirtier than anything else. Here's a look at what they are and just how dirty a hotel room can be. The results are from a 2012 study conducted by researchers at the University of Houston. See the full story at Business Insider Most Read More from ajc.com
